title: Calories in a Twisted Tea
meta_description: Discover calories in a twisted tea (12 oz serving), plus carbs, sugars, alcohol content, and nutrition breakdowns for this popular hard iced tea.
assumptions: Original flavor, 12 fl oz bottle/can, 5% ABV, no added mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, serving size, and temperature; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Twisted Tea Original has 144 kcal, mostly from carbs and alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to Twisted Tea Light (per serving)
Add a splash of lemon juice (1 oz)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Twisted Tea Original?
What are the carbs in a Twisted Tea?
faqs.a: About 13.9 g carbs, all from sugars, per 12 oz.

faqs.q: Does Twisted Tea have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; it's primarily carbs and alcohol.

faqs.q: How does Twisted Tea Light compare?
faqs.a: Only 50 kcal per 12 oz, with 4 g carbs versus original's 144 kcal.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Twisted Tea?
faqs.a: Low at 10 mg per serving; suitable for most diets.
